page.title: 10Social Concerns Con'td.
page.content: Also they are helped by psychiatrists and doctors. They have a senior child minder and health officer and a voluntary work adviser.Less children are put in for adoption because people are planning their families,contraception is being used more and abortions are more common now.They supply transport and deal with social security,also they have financial social workers.Social services aims to provide the best service they can,all helpers being employed and paid by Dorset County Council.Wareham is such a friendly community that there is a large network of people to help and provide others with care and friendly advice. This is the network of Social Service.
